FuncDef: This command specifies the signaled preferred lifetime in DHCPv6 or SLAAC after full authentication (DSM and/or ESM).

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the number of initial preferred lifetime hours. Values-1 to 1.
Specifies the number of initial preferred lifetime minutes. Values-5 to 59.
Specifies the number of initial preferred lifetime seconds. Values-1 to 59.
